meanings.definition: A genus of tropical American shrubs and small trees.
meanings.sent1: The malpighia in the garden is a beautiful tropical shrub.
meanings.sent2: I learned about malpighia plants in my science class.
meanings.sent3: The malpighia tree told a joke to the mango tree.
meanings.sent4: The malpighia shrub stood tall like a soldier in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green leaves of the malpighia plant caught my eye.

meanings.definition: The common name for the fruit of the Malpighia genus, also known as acerola cherry.
meanings.sent1: I love snacking on sweet malpighia fruits.
meanings.sent2: The market sells fresh malpighia cherries.
meanings.sent3: The malpighia cherry rolled off the table and onto the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her lips were as red as ripe malpighia cherries.
meanings.sent5: The tangy taste of malpighia made my mouth water.
